message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with predicting clothing deformation in 3D as a function of human pose, shape, and garment style, which involves computer graphics (cs.GR) and computer vision (cs.CV) techniques. The authors also use machine learning (cs.MM) to train their model and discuss the use of physical constraints in their approach, which falls under artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper presents experiments and results, which could be categorized under machine learning (cs.LG).
